author: gumb00
content: I don't think they are "doomed", including EXTDATACOPY seems simple, maybe in the future

author: gumb00
content: I don't think recursive validation is on the table anymore, with DATALOADN we have to validate only one-level deep at the point of RETURNCONTRACT

author: gumb00
content: Note also that <@403707149043105803> 's suggestion from above about limiting container nesting depth is not needed in this case either, as embedded containers are opaque blobs really
